_header: Wose wartt wid pritte abeit amadde
Subjects: death, meditations on; body, parts of
_description: English and Latin verses on the beasts produced by various parts of the dead body: ‘Ex cerebro bufo, de spina scorpio…’ — ten lines in couplets

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Wose wartt wid pritte abeit amaddeOf heore brein wl waccen a
                    cadde…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Iesus þat is us alle bouenleit us alle to merci
                    comen
CamTCC323.Note: Written two lines of verse per line in the MS.
